title: Wishful thinking?
content: Is any of you gyus aware about any **free font design software** on the web?
author: MickM

comments.content: Whats the point of using a free software which generally don’t have that much tools. U can use demo version of FontLab..the only thing that you can’t do with the demo is save files.But I’m assuming that you need it for learning purpose. Because if you design type..you should atleast have an original copy of fontlab.(FontLab is the best available in the market)

http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/  
wait until the pop-up comes up and start downloading. =)

–RTFRT–

Actually, the demo version of FontLab Studio allows you to save up to 20 glyphs per font.
